description: Useful links to active travel related information, including walking and cycling.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Why not improve your health, save money, and experience London in a different way? Leave your car at home and walk or cycle instead."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Walking"}
Research by Public Health England shows that leaving your car at home and walking briskly for just ten minutes, twice a day, improves your health.
In London, at least 42% of adults aren't doing enough physical activity to stay healthy.
{"template":"start-row","link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Cycling"}
The number of cyclists on London's roads has almost doubled in the last ten years. Our Cycleways are transforming streets, making cycling easier, safer and available to everyone.
Why not improve your cycling with free cycle skills training ? Whether you've just starting cycling, or you ride regularly, our sessions are for all abilities.
